basics.name: Ronan Russel M. Andal
basics.label: Web Support Specialist & IT Student Assistant

highlights: Contributed to the integration of ATMOS, the combined membership program of Hawaiian and Alaska Airlines.
Integrated Hawaiian Airlines (HA) flight lookup functionality into the Alaska Airlines (AS) website using C#, enabling seamless retrieval of HA reservation data.
Developed and deployed a Sumo Logic dashboard to monitor HA lookup success and failure rates, providing real-time visibility for engineering and product teams.

work.summary: Engineered a Python web application to automate extraction of conveyance tax values, sales prices, and sale dates from Bureau of Conveyance PDF documents, increasing data collection speed by 10x.
highlights: Structured and exported extracted data into spreadsheets for streamlined reporting and housing policy analysis.

work.summary: Trained under IT professionals to deliver technical support, resolving hardware, software, and network issues for faculty, staff, and students.
Responsible for developing and managing the website for the UH Organic Transition project (UHOT)
highlights: Successfully redesigned and optimized the UHOT website, improving user experience and accessibility.
Managed and updated the websiteâ€™s content management system, ensuring accurate and timely updates.

work.summary: Tech-oriented Student Assistant providing support, customer service, and multitasking
highlights: Developed an online check out system for our library, enhancing transaction efficiency
Provided technical support to colleagues and assisted in troubleshootine common issues setup countless computers & projectors for meetings / events to be ready
Enhanced customer satisfaction by providing attentive service and promptly addressing dinner needs
Assisted in the setup and breakdown of events, ensuring  timely completion and smooth operations
Served hundreds of customers a day and gave each one my full attention, also memorized a handful of regulars' usual orders
Occasionally called upon to assist the tech department during busy periods.
Taught to order our stock for the week and did it for my team at times when she was too busy
Delivered exceptional customer service from a young age while balancing work responsibilities alongside high school commitments.
Efficiently managed closing duties and maintained a clean and organized work environment.
